name: Submarine Adventures
description:
Description

Up to three divers swim under the sea, facing a lot of cute fishes. No violence here, the only things the divers will throw are bubbles.

Try to make the highest score in this endless horizontal shoot'em up game.

This game was performed during the Global Game Jam 2021 event,  alone at home due to the COVID-19 health situation.

Enjoy !

Controls

All controls are performed with a gamepad.

Press the START button to register your diver. Or press BACK to unregister.

When all players are ready, one can press START button and the swim begins.

Move your diver using either the left analog axis, or the cross. Throw bubbles by pressing the A button.

Bubbles will collide with fishes only when they have just went out of the bubble gun. If the buble is too far, it becomes to go upward to the surface, and at this moment, it is not able to hit any fish. So stay close to the fishes to make them disappear.

Download

GFX

This game contains graphics taken from the Internet because I was unable to team with other jammers. My bad ^^

Sfx and Music

Sorry, no sound dimension in this game this year. No jammer available at home ^^
